languages.text: "Про это я могу рассказать. Отовсюду и ниоткуда. Я..." {n}— глаза Ардженты на мгновение становятся темнее.{/n} "Я — дитя офицеров {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}. Я родилась в трюме боевого корабля, росла в бросках с одной планеты на другую, и потеряла семью в огне праведной войны".

traits.locale_text: "Про это я могу рассказать. Отовсюду и ниоткуда. Я..." {n}— глаза Ардженты на мгновение становятся темнее.{/n} "Я — дитя офицеров имперской гвардии. Я родилась в трюме боевого корабля, росла в бросках с одной планеты на другую, и потеряла семью в огне праведной войны".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."
languages.original_text: "Про это я могу рассказать. Отовсюду и ниоткуда. Я..." {n}— глаза Ардженты на мгновение становятся темнее.{/n} "Я — дитя офицеров {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}. Я родилась в трюме боевого корабля, росла в бросках с одной планеты на другую, и потеряла семью в огне праведной войны".

I was born in the hold of a battleship, grew up on redeployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “现在我可以告诉你了。我来自银河系各地，但我并没有故乡。我……”{n}阿洁塔的眼神黯淡了片刻。{/n}“我的父母都是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}的军官。我出生在战舰的船舱里，跟随我父母的调度，不断地在各个行星之间辗转往复，就这样长大成人。后来，爆发了一场正义的战争，而我的家人被烈焰吞噬了。”
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: “现在我可以告诉你了。我来自银河系各地，但我并没有故乡。我……”{n}阿洁塔的眼神黯淡了片刻。{/n}“我的父母都是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}的军官。我出生在战舰的船舱里，跟随我父母的调度，不断地在各个行星之间辗转往复，就这样长大成人。后来，爆发了一场正义的战争，而我的家人被烈焰吞噬了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the Imperial Guard. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

languages.text: «Eso sí se lo puedo contar. Vengo de todas partes y de ninguna. Soy...». {n}Los ojos de Argenta se oscurecen momentáneamente.{/n} «Soy hija de una pareja de oficiales de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}. Nací en la bodega de una nave de guerra, crecí siguiendo los despliegues de mis padres en diversos planetas y perdí a mi familia entre las llamas de una guerra justa».
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: «Eso sí se lo puedo contar. Vengo de todas partes y de ninguna. Soy...» {n}Los ojos de Argenta se oscurecen momentáneamente.{/n} «Soy hija de una pareja de oficiales de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}. Nací en la bodega de una nave de guerra, crecí siguiendo los despliegues de mis padres en diversos planetas y perdí a mi familia entre las llamas de una guerra justa».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「今だから言える。私はどこの出身であるとも言えるだろう。私は…」{n}アルジェンタの目が一瞬暗くなる。{/n}「私は{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の将校の子供だ。私は軍艦の船倉で生まれ、両親の星から星への配備に従って育ち、正義の戦争の炎の中で家族を失ったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: 「今だから言える。私はどこの出身であるとも言えるだろう。私は…」{n}アルジェンタの目が一瞬暗くなる。{/n}「私は{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}の将校の子供だ。私は軍艦の船倉で生まれ、両親の星から星への配備に従って育ち、正義の戦争の炎の中で家族を失ったのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Das kann ich Euch sagen. Ich komme von überall und nirgendwo. Ich ..." {n}Argentas Augen verdüstern sich kurz.{/n} "Ich bin ein Kind von Offizieren der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g}. Ich wurde im Laderaum eines Kriegsschiffs geboren, bin als Kind von einem Planeten zum anderen umgezogen, wo meine Eltern eben gerade stationiert waren, und haben meine Familie in den Flammen eines rechtschaffenen Kriegs verloren."
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: "Das kann ich Euch sagen. Ich komme von überall und nirgendwo. Ich ..." {n}Argentas Augen verdüstern sich kurz.{/n} "Ich bin ein Kind von Offizieren der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperialen Armee{/g}. Ich wurde im Laderaum eines Kriegsschiffs geboren, bin als Kind von einem Planeten zum anderen umgezogen, wo meine Eltern eben gerade stationiert waren, und haben meine Familie in den Flammen eines rechtschaffenen Kriegs verloren."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Puisque je peux désormais vous le dire, sachez que je viens de partout et de nulle part. Je... » {n}Les yeux d'Argenta s'assombrissent l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Je suis la fille d'officiers de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g}. Je suis née dans la soute d'un vaisseau de guerre, j'ai grandi en suivant mes parents d'une mission à l'autre, et j'ai perdu ma famille dans les flammes d'une guerre vertueuse. »
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: « Puisque je peux désormais vous le dire, sachez que je viens de partout et de nulle part. Je... » {n}Les yeux d'Argenta s'assombrissent l'espace d'un instant.{/n} « Je suis la fille d'officiers de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g}. Je suis née dans la soute d'un vaisseau de guerre, j'ai grandi en suivant mes parents d'une mission à l'autre, et j'ai perdu ma famille dans les flammes d'une guerre vertueuse. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Bu soruya cevap verebilirim. Memleketim her yer, aynı zamanda hiçbir yer. Ben..." {n}Argenta'nın gözlerine bir karaltı çöküyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızı{/g} subayların çocuğuyum. Bir savaş gemisinin ambarında doğdum. Annemle babam, gezegenden gezegene koşarken beni de yanlarında götürürdü. Meşru bir savaşın ortasında onları kaybettim."
languages.original_text: "Now that I can tell you. I come from everywhere and nowhere. I..." {n}Argenta's eyes darken for a moment.{/n} "I am the child of officers of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. I was born in the hold of a warship, grew up following my parents' deployments from one planet to another, and lost my family in the flames of a righteous war."

traits.locale_text: "İşte bu soruya bir cevabım var. Memleketim her yer, aynı zamanda hiçbir yer. Ben..." {n}Argenta'nın gözlerine bir karaltı çöküyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızı{/g} subayların çocuğuyum. Bir savaş gemisinin ambarında doğdum. Ebeveynlerim gezegenden gezegene koşarken beni de yanlarında götürürdü. Meşru bir savaşın ortasında onları kaybettim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
